channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/summer-series-firebrands-miss-bernburgs-finishing-school-for-young-ladies
Rach and Rich continue their third Summer Series. This series covers games in the Firebrands style of PbtA games. This fifth episode of the series features Andrea of Plotbunny Games, creator of *​Miss Bernburg’s Finishing School for Young Ladies* .
Timecodes: 00:06:02- Setting Up 00:17:33 - The Challenge 00:26:09 - Playing the Games
You can find Andrea's itch store here: https://catcurious.itch.io/ She tweets here: https://twitter.com/this_curiouscat Plotbunny Games website (in German) is located here: https://plotbunnygames.com/
Andrea generously agreed to share her Firebrands Games research with us! https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1KB0-b2K1APeVg8j5pD7Xct1A2XyeKemgael-AIT0-7c/edit?usp=sharing
